headline: Why McKesson Stock Bumped Modestly Higher Today
summary: The company posted double-digit-percentage improvements in its latest set of quarterly results.  Storied healthcare supplies company McKesson (NYSE: MCK) was a slight outperformer on the stock exchange Friday, as investors considered its results for its fourth quarter of fiscal 2025.  After market hours Thursday, McKesson divulged that it earned revenue of $90.8 billion for the period, a meaty 19% improvement over the same quarter the previous year.

headline: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) Reports US$90 Billion Sales With 66% Q4 Net Income Rise
summary: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) recently reported a significant increase in earnings for the fourth quarter and full year, reflecting robust growth in sales and net income. This performance, alongside the launch of its Precision Care Companion initiative in April, highlights the company's strategic focus on improving healthcare outcomes. Simultaneously, McKesson's declared dividend and the strong financial results likely bolstered investor confidence, aligning with a broader market trend of 1.3% growth...

headline: MCK Stock Up on Q4 Earnings Beat & Potential Surgical Biz Spin-Off
summary: McKesson's fourth-quarter fiscal 2025 results showcase growth in the U.S. Pharmaceutical segment. However, Medical Surgical Solutions suffers due to lower COVID-related sales.
